description: outdoor scene of the grounds of a fair with various buildings and structures including a green striped caravan on the left side of the image and a large red building on the right; three small figures are shown next to the structures and a small row of houses are shown in the distant background; paint is applied thickly in predominantly blues, grays, greens, yellows, purples, and red
signed: LRC of canvas in pencil, on verso: Walter Gramatté / 14
title: Fairground
